courses.name: Diploma of Travel and Tourism Management

courses.name: Advanced Diploma of Travel and Tourism Management
courses.note: Only valid for students who have successfully completed SIT50116 - Diploma of Travel and Tourism Management.Includes 4 service periods for unit SITXCCS008 – Develop and manage quality customer service practices.
